meanings.definition: A woman who works for a newspaper.
meanings.sent1: The newspaperwomen reported on the local event.
meanings.sent2: I admire the dedication of newspaperwomen in delivering news.
meanings.sent3: The newspaperwomen joked about writing the front-page story.
meanings.sent4: The newspaperwomen were the unsung heroes of the press.
meanings.sent5: The newspaperwomen's bylines were always prominent in the paper.

meanings.definition: Women who write for or work at a newspaper.
meanings.sent1: My aunt is one of the talented newspaperwomen at the city paper.
meanings.sent2: The newspaperwomen interviewed the mayor for an exclusive story.
meanings.sent3: The newspaperwomen shared funny anecdotes from their newsroom.
meanings.sent4: In the world of journalism, newspaperwomen shine bright.
meanings.sent5: The newspaperwomen's articles were insightful and engaging.
